item.title: REGENERON PHARMACEUTICALS INC 10-K
item.description: REGENERON PHARMACEUTICALS INC, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 06, 2023 had 59489 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
